description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 10/27/2005

Thorne knows that Spectra is finished, although Sally remains optimistic. Unbeknownst to Thomas and Gaby, Taylor reveals she was able to get the government to grant Gaby official status, and have her college scholarship restored. Eric finds Massimo and Stephanie in his office, and Stephanie and Eric have it out.
captions: all beautiful
